/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. On either side of the road, there are trees and buildings, adding to the urban landscape. The road itself is lined with a guardrail, ensuring the safety of the drivers. A few cars can be seen on the road, indicating that it's a busy area. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue sky and the gray of the buildings and road. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing its blend of nature and urban development.
